original_title: Real Pirates: Outlaws of the Sea
overview: As long as there have been sailors, there have been pirates: This rousing docudrama provides an overview of the ocean's outlaws over the ages. From the heyday of pirates through present-day freebooters, the film sorts through legend and lore, facts and falsehoods to provide an in-depth look at the influence of pirates. Additional treasure includes previews for classic buccaneer flicks, matey!
title: Real Pirates: Outlaws of the Sea
